page.title: 17UNEMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Unemployment in Camberley is not as bad as in other areas,although it is the highest in Surrey.The local community provides various services. A Youth Training Scheme in the area teaches youths various skills which they use when drafted into jobs,often of their own choice. Within the area advice centres are set up so that people can discuss their individual problems and join in with groups of other unemployed people.Youth Opportunity Schemes are available to people wanting to learn a trade.Companies in the area are willing to take young people on for short periods of time.However there is only one Job Centre in Camberley. Youth groups are set up providing leisure activities and other interests to keep unemployed people off the streets and out of trouble.
